feed.title: Leiboff does Research
feed.subtitle: A plant genomics data and code sharing website. Home of COGS RNAseq for maize tassel and sorghum panicle datasets.

entry.title: RNAseq workshop at CSHL!
entry.content: I had a blast teaching at the Cold Spring Harbor Workshop on Cereal Genomics! Andrea Eveland from the Donald Danforth Center Plant Science Center gave an amazing lecture on all the ways that gene expression data can inform plant science. Then we did a hands-on command line RNAseq analysis– from raw reads to developmental inference. You can find the course materials here.
entry.summary: I had a blast teaching at the Cold Spring Harbor Workshop on Cereal Genomics! entry.title: Leiboff publishes a paper!
entry.content: Check out our new research on the gene expression dynamics of developing maize and sorghum panicles in Current Biology. I had a lot of fun dissecting, imaging, and performing RNA sequencing on so many immature maize and sorghum inflorescences. They’re beautiful up close!
